title: November 21, 2017 - Error 003 Server issues
body:
Hey guys, 

You may receive a **003 error **while patching, or randomly while the client is open.  

https://i.imgur.com/HSCZR8l.png

Something is up with our servers, as the error message so boldly puts it.  Our network team is digging into this now, keep an eye on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates to follow.


> Update:  Our network team is on the case and providing updates in the [Live Incident Breakdown ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/HLBQzvEa-1121-patching-issues?show=flat)thread.

replies.body: Wooo is started to download for me....too bad I need to got to slepp because I have fucking school tommorow
I don't think it has anything to do with it
I haven't collected season rewards, may that cause a problem with patching?
Is this just in NA? Cause I'm in Italy (EUW server) and it is having the same trouble as this Error 003

i have restarted my computer uninstalled and tried re-installing the client. it stops at 4583.0 out of 5400.4 and then says repair failed. i dont know what to do. is the issue resolved yet? and when it is resolved will i be able to complete the install.
don't need to mean they are doing their best to fix the problem and besides the riot support team is really dedicated compared to others *couug*EA*cough*
I was on my hot spot and repatched, so much precious data wasted because I didn't notice this post in time D:
I was just curious about what happened.I can wait

> [{quoted}](name=kappapisigma,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TnsAe3dU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-21T20:01:31.412+0000)
>
> I was just curious about what happened.I can wait

Riot company scavenger hunt. Bob from accounting had a server cable on his list. Rather than grab an old one, he disconnected the game servers. When everyone sobers up and gets back to their desk and notices, I'm sure they'll plug it back in. =P

I'm really curious as to what might have caused it. I thought buying Zoe did, but it didn't pop up until a while after I bought her. Patiently waiting. I have faith in the network team! <3 

And thank you so much Porocles for the quick responses and hard work. I see you all over the forums constantly answering us! Thank you!

Also, adding this: I'm sometimes getting Error: 500 for forums. Don't know if that is because of the influx of people trying to figure out the issue, or if the forums are going down, too?
bumb, this is happening to me too
You're not alone, friend!  Don't worry, our network team is on the job to get this resolved!
Do you know what happened exactly?
